description: This file is a React component named App that implements a basic single-page application with breadcrumb navigation, routing based on URL hash, and content rendering for different routes like home, products list, and product details. It uses hooks such as useState, useEffect, and useMemo, and includes external components like Breadcrumbs.

methods.name: normalizeHash
methods.description: Removes the leading '#' from the URL hash and ensures a default '/' if empty.

methods.name: parseHash
methods.description: Parses the hash into route and parameters, identifying specific paths like home, products, and product detail with ':item'.

methods.name: navigate
methods.description: Updates the window location hash to navigate programmatically.

methods.name: renderContent
methods.description: Renders different JSX content based on the current route, including home page, product list, and product details.
